title: Sample vs. Population
text: The population is the entire group in which you are interested in obeserving. A sample is a small portion of the initial population.

title: Data
text: Data is the general term used to describe the observations gathered.

title: Statistic vs. Variable
text: A statistic is a number generated through calculation from a sample. A variable is the measure,emt taken from eac individua; which we previously found to be X.
